document.name: johnlewis
document.description: <customer> <Name>John Lewis Partnership plc</Name> <Description>What began as a London drapery has evolved into one of the UK's largest and arguably most diversified retailers. John Lewis Partnership (JLP) operates 30 John Lewis department stores, about 10 at home shops, some 255 Waitrose supermarkets, and 35 convenience stores, across the UK, as well as an online and catalog shopping business, John Lewis Direct. Among its business-to-business deals, John Lewis Direct delivers Waitrose products through Internet grocer Ocado. JLP's activities include subsidiaries that make furniture and bedding, and a 4,000-acre Leckford Estate in Hampshire that grows produce and supplies milk, poultry, and eggs for sale at Waitrose. The company and its staff co-own JLP.</Description> <emailPostFix>@fake.johnlewispartnership.co.uk</emailPostFix> <website>http://www.johnlewispartnership.co.uk/</website> <address>171 Victoria St.</address> <city>London</city> <state /> <zip>SW1E 5NN</zip> <country>United Kingdom</country> <stockTicker /> <industry>Retail</industry> </customer>
